root.name: Islands of Wakfu
root.description: Overview ANKAMA Group's first console game, Islands of Wakfu was released on XBLA on the 30th of March 2011. It features 2 player co-op, 14 levels, 2 difficulty modes as well as 12 achievements that are interlinked with the upcoming online roleplaying game Wakfu. For example, unlocking an achievement in Islands will unlock a quest in the MMO game. Islands of Wakfu takes place in the same universe as the above mentioned MMO game, albeit 10000 years earlier. Players will be able to choose from 2 different characters that are "hot-swappable" during gameplay. Nora can use teleports and uses fists and kicks to dish out damage, while Efrim is a dragon who casts fireballs.
